alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 26 at 1:59AM MST until February 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 8 AM MST this morning. For the High Wind Watch, from 7 PM MST tonight through 5 AM MST tomorrow. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera
